NPragma = Pragma[NimNode]
Pragma with nim node   Source   Edit 
PPragma = Pragma[PNode]
Pragma with pnode   Source   Edit 
Pragma[N] = object
  kind*: ObjectAnnotKind     ## Position in object - no used when
                             ## generatic functions etc.
  elements*: seq[N]          ## List of pragma elements. For annotation
                             ## like `{.hello, world.}` this will contain
                             ## `@[hello, world]`
Body of pragma annotation;   Source   Edit

func getElem[N](pragma: Pragma[N]; name: string): Option[N]
Get element named name if it is present. getElem({.call.}, "call") -> call getElem({.call(arg).}, "call") -> call(arg)   Source   Edit

func toNNode[N](pragma: Pragma[N]): N
Convert pragma to N. If pragma has no elements empty node (nnkEmptyNode) will be returned.   Source   Edit
